snippet.title: World of Tanks - Announcement Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
World of Tanks is coming to PlayStation 4! Visit PS4.WorldofTanks.com for more information.

Command history’s most powerful tanks and experience the intensity of tank combat on console like never before. Charge into the fray and engage in epic 15-v-15 multiplayer tank battles. Hundreds of stunningly realistic mid-20th century armored fighting vehicles from seven nations await your command. Experience the thrill of heavy-hitting tank brawling, unlock and upgrade your vehicles, and expand your collection of tanks!

http://worldoftanks.com/

©2015 Wargaming.net. All rights reserved. “Wargaming.net” and “World of Tanks” and their respective logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of Wargaming in the USA and other countries.
